logic.playerState

Class District

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.playerState.District

  • public class District
extends java.lang.Object
    class representing the players points. A district holds a number of cells containing SingleTiles of the same District type. This class also provides a method to generate the corresponding points.

      • merge

        public District merge(District other)
        Merges two districts if a tile is
        Parameters:
        other - district that will be merged with current one
        Returns:
        reference to the object (so that the newly merged district can call the add method for the remaining tile that put those two together (in the same line -> d1.merge(d2).add(tileX)))

      • genPoints

        public int genPoints()
        Generates the value of points this district is worth
        Returns:
        points of the district (member count x number of token)

      • typeAndPosMatchCurrDistrict

        public boolean typeAndPosMatchCurrDistrict(SingleTile tile,
                                           Pos pos)
        Checks if a given tile with a position is next to one of the district members
        Parameters:
        tile - tile that will be checked
        pos - pos that will be checked
        Returns:
        true if one district member is next to the given pos and the district type matches, position cannot be already contained in the district (AssertionError)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
